text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t != 0 ) { long int i , n ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; long int c = 1 , c1 = 0 , d = n ; long int arr [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } i = 0 ; while ( i < ( n - 1 ) ) { c = 1 ; while ( arr [ i + 1 ] > arr [ i ] ) { c ++ ; i ++ ; if ( i == ( n - 1 ) ) { break ; } } i = i + 1 ; c1 = ( ( c * ( c + 1 ) ) / 2 ) - c ; d = d + c1 ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , d ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; }

{ long int i , n ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; long int c = 1 , c1 = 0 , d = n ; long int arr [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } i = 0 ; while ( i < ( n - 1 ) ) { c = 1 ; while ( arr [ i + 1 ] > arr [ i ] ) { c ++ ; i ++ ; if ( i == ( n - 1 ) ) { break ; } } i = i + 1 ; c1 = ( ( c * ( c + 1 ) ) / 2 ) - c ; d = d + c1 ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , d ) ; t -- ; }
long int c = 1 , c1 = 0 , d = n ;
for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & arr [ i ] ) ; }
while ( arr [ i + 1 ] > arr [ i ] ) { c ++ ; i ++ ; if ( i == ( n - 1 ) ) { break ; } }
